amendment.description: Amendment sought to replace the bill's requirement for asbestos trusts to disclose detailed personal information with aggregate reporting of demands received and payments made by the trusts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 10 printed in House Report 114-389 to replace the bill's requirement for asbestos trusts to disclose detailed personal information with aggregate reporting of demands received and payments made by the trusts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 222 (Roll no. 31).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 222 (Roll no. 31).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Nadler.
